channel.title: consumer on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in consumer on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: VISA Application SaaS
item.description: VISA Application SaaS Mission Simplify the tiring visa application process for both ends Problem Visa application takes a long time -> outdated Energy consuming for both ends of parties The standard is rather subjective Solution Use AI to predict if applicant is likely to be accepted or not Legaltech can be worked with conjunction Govetech like solution to streamline the entire process in the future
item.content:encoded: VISA Application SaaS Mission Simplify the tiring visa application process for both ends Problem Visa application takes a long time -&gt; outdated Energy consuming for both ends of parties The standard is rather subjective Solution Use AI to predict if applicant is likely to be accepted or not Legaltech can be worked with conjunction Govetech like solution to streamline the entire process in the future

item.title: D2C SUSHI CUISINE
item.description: D2C SUSHI CUISINE Mission BRING THE AUTHENTIC SUSHI EXPERIENCE TO EVERYONE, ANYWHERE, ANYPLACE Problem The quality of sushi in the states is vastly volatile Very difficult to enjoy fresh sushi at home The experience of sushi cuisine is not authentic Solution Cutting-solution through luxurious authentic experiences Deliver to anytime, anywhere, anyplace in LA Provide an authentic, natural & unique experience to all
item.content:encoded: D2C SUSHI CUISINE Mission BRING THE AUTHENTIC SUSHI EXPERIENCE TO EVERYONE, ANYWHERE, ANYPLACE Problem The quality of sushi in the states is vastly volatile Very difficult to enjoy fresh sushi at home The experience of sushi cuisine is not authentic Solution Cutting-solution through luxurious authentic experiences Deliver to anytime, anywhere, anyplace in LA Provide an authentic, natural &amp; unique experience to all

item.title: Consumer First Influencer
item.description: Consumer First Influencer Mission Bring out the power of non-influencers for a better and generic consumer experience Problem Marketing utilizing influencers are becoming out of fashion - too fancy Hidden need for normal people to sponsor generic content Influencer’s lives are not within the reach of normal people Solution Have normal people provide authentic reviews for generic feedback & marketing Let close friends influence your consumer experience, not elaborate celebrities More authentic reviews to provide truthful consumer experiences
item.content:encoded: Consumer First Influencer Mission Bring out the power of non-influencers for a better and generic consumer experience Problem Marketing utilizing influencers are becoming out of fashion - too fancy Hidden need for normal people to sponsor generic content Influencer&rsquo;s lives are not within the reach of normal people Solution Have normal people provide authentic reviews for generic feedback &amp; marketing Let close friends influence your consumer experience, not elaborate celebrities More authentic reviews to provide truthful consumer experiences

item.title: Enterprise D2C Consumer
item.description: Enterprise D2C Consumer Mission Provide consumers with enterprise-grade goods Problem Enterprise goods are often more cheap, stable, and large in quantity compared to consumer goods Consumers are hard to obtain enterprise goods due to market obstacles Enterprise are reluctant to sell consumers enterprise level goods Solution World’s first solution for consumers to get hands on enterprise level goods Refined marketing in ordered to promote otherwise “ugly” products Disrupt the EC and activate the fluidity in the marketplace
item.content:encoded: Enterprise D2C Consumer Mission Provide consumers with enterprise-grade goods Problem Enterprise goods are often more cheap, stable, and large in quantity compared to consumer goods Consumers are hard to obtain enterprise goods due to market obstacles Enterprise are reluctant to sell consumers enterprise level goods Solution World&rsquo;s first solution for consumers to get hands on enterprise level goods Refined marketing in ordered to promote otherwise &ldquo;ugly&rdquo; products Disrupt the EC and activate the fluidity in the marketplace
